revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=R8000 |revision=-100NAS |asin=B00KWHMR6G |newegg=N82E16833122611 |price=300 |series=AC3200 |est_release_date=07/11/2014 |fcc_date=06/02/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Foxconn |manuf_model=U12H315 |manuf_rev=T20 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=PY314200264 |ic_id=4054A-14200264 |pcb_id=U12H315T20 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4709A0;BCM4709A0KFEBG, TT1418 P10, 372829-03 Z1D; |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G08AA-TI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646Q-BCK0 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, populated,, 3.3V TTL |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1418 P11, 379203 65 3A W; |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1418 P11, 379203 65 3A W; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM43602;BCM43602KMLG, TN1418 P11, 379203 65 3A W; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85309-11;;3; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85710-11;;3; ,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85712-21;SKY21, 85712, 416S5;3; ,,, 3-lane, 3-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX;PEX8603;PLX, PEX8603-AB50NI G, 1413, 3306D, TAIWAN;1; |stock_boot=CFE |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=FreshTomato-ARM, OpenWrt, Tomato (shibby), DD-WRT (kongac ARM), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=NETGEARXX |default_ssid_regex=^NETGEAR[0-9]{2}$ |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=E8:FC:AF |oui_eth=E8:FC:AF }}
:• 2x '''1300''' Mbps - 2x 3-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• 1x '''600''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''3200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Nighthawk X6 - AC3200 Smart WiFi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://netgear.com/home/products/networking/wifi-routers/R8000.aspx#tab-techspecs}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=R8000}} While not really represented well in the infobox, this is a tri-radio device - all radios :(2x 5GHz [11an+ac], 1x 2.4GHz [11bgn]) used are BCM43602 (''FullMAC'') :BCM43602 is supported in the mainline '''Linux''' kernel by [[brcmfmac]] "U12H315T20", "801726", and "GP REV 1" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Netgear R8000P|Netgear R8500|Foxconn}} *[http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00KWHMR6G?tag=wiki085-20 Netgear R8000-100NAS] (North American Solutions) :''US'' region (United States of America) *[http://www.amazon.de/Netgear-Nighthawk-R8000-100PES-Wireless-Beamforming/dp/B00SWEEYJ4 Netgear R8000-100PES] (Pan European Solutions) :''CE'' region (Central and Eastern Europe) :''WW'' region (World Wide) ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32474-netgear-r8000-nighthawk-x6-first-look#add First look on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] * [http://www.hkepc.com/11543 ''Netgear Nighthawk X6 R8000'' On '''HKEPC HardWare'''] (CN) * [http://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/6688/netgear-nighthawk-x6-r8000-ac3200-wireless-router-review/index.html ''Netgear Nighthawk X6 R8000 AC3200'' on '''TweakTown'''] * [http://www.ixbt.com/comm/netgear-r8000.shtml First look on '''iXBT.com'''] * [http://foxnetwork.ru/index.php/ru/component/content/article/188-netgear-r8000.html Review on FoxNetwork (RU)] * [http://foxnetlab.com/index.php/16-reviews/146-wireless-router-netgear-nighthawk-x6-r8000-or-even-more-cosmic-space-at-our-homes Review on FoxNetLab (EN)] * [https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/netgear/r8000/ Review on OpenITforum (PL)] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=263233 ''Netgear R8000'' on the '''DD-WRT''' forums] *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=55367 ''Netgear R8000 support'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] ===News=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32429-ac3200-routers-by-july ''AC3200 Routers By July?'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :references [http://www.expreview.com/33603.html this '''EXPreview''' (CN) article] * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-features/32451-mu-mimo-vs-xstream-the-coming-battle-for-wi-fi-airtime?showall=&start=1 ''MU-MIMO vs. XStream: Coming Battle for Wi-Fi Airtime'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] * [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s840231 ''Doubles Wi-Fi Speed of Devices with Six Stream 802.11ac'' ('''Broadcom''' PR)] :Announces the '''XStream''' platform (.. which seems to be BCM4709 + 3x BCM43602), :which is touted as 'Penta Core' (each 43602 radio embeds a small processor to allow :for FullMAC operation, 4709 remains the same dual-core Cortex A9 SoC it already was) * [http://www.broadcom.com/products/Wireless-LAN/802.11-Wireless-LAN-Solutions/BCM4707-4708-4709 ''BCM4709 (1GHz dual-core Cortex A9 SoC)'' Product page] * [http://www.broadcom.com/press/release.php?id=s817141 ''Broadcom Launches Enhanced 5G WiFi Video Streaming'' ('''Broadcom''' PR)] : Announces the BCM43602 3x3 11ac PCIe SoC ===GPL Info=== *[https://github.com/mirror/dd-wrt/blob/master/src/router/netgear/ambitCfg-r8000.h On ''DD-WRT'' GitHub] {{SCollapse|GPL info >> • |
/*formal version control*/
#define AMBIT_HARDWARE_VERSION     "U12H315T00"
#define AMBIT_SOFTWARE_VERSION     "V1.0.2.99"
#define AMBIT_UI_VERSION           "1.1.99"
#define STRING_TBL_VERSION         "1.0.2.99_2.1.40.1"

#define AMBIT_PRODUCT_NAME          "R8000"
#define AMBIT_PRODUCT_ALIAS         "Nighthawk X6"
#define AMBIT_PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION   
"802.11ac Dual Band Gigabit Wireless Router R8000"
#define UPnP_MODEL_URL              "R8000.aspx"
#define UPnP_MODEL_DESCRIPTION      "802.11ac"

#define AMBIT_NVRAM_VERSION  "1" /* digital only */

/****************************************************************************
 * Board-specific defintions
 *
 ****************************************************************************/

/* Interface definitions */
#define WAN_IF_NAME_NUM             "eth0"
#define LAN_IF_NAME_NUM             "vlan1"
#define WLAN_IF_NAME_NUM            "eth1"
#define WLAN_N_IF_NAME_NUM          "eth2"
#if defined(R8000)
#define WLAN_5G_2_IF_NAME_NUM          "eth3"
#endif
#define WDS_IF_NAME_NUM             "wds0.1"    /* WDS interface */

/* Foxconn add start by aspen Bai, 11/13/2008 */
#ifdef MULTIPLE_SSID
#define WLAN_BSS1_NAME_NUM          "wl0.1"     /* Multiple BSSID #2 */
#define WLAN_BSS2_NAME_NUM          "wl0.2"     /* Multiple BSSID #3 */
#define WLAN_BSS3_NAME_NUM          "wl0.3"     /* Multiple BSSID #4 */

/* Foxconn add start, Tony W.Y. Wang, 03/22/2010 @For 5G*/
#define WLAN_5G_BSS1_NAME_NUM       "wl1.1"     /* Multiple BSSID #2 */
#define WLAN_5G_BSS2_NAME_NUM       "wl1.2"     /* Multiple BSSID #3 */
#define WLAN_5G_BSS3_NAME_NUM       "wl1.3"     /* Multiple BSSID #4 */

/* Foxconn add end, Tony W.Y. Wang, 03/22/2010 @For 5G*/
#define WLAN_5G_2_BSS1_NAME_NUM       "wl2.1"     /* Multiple BSSID #2 */
#define WLAN_5G_2_BSS2_NAME_NUM       "wl2.2"     /* Multiple BSSID #3 */
#define WLAN_5G_2_BSS3_NAME_NUM       "wl2.3"     /* Multiple BSSID #4 */
#endif /* MULTIPLE_SSID */
/* Foxconn add end by aspen Bai, 11/13/2008 */

/* GPIO definitions */
/* Foxconn modified start, Wins, 04/11/2011 */

#define GPIO_POWER_LED_GREEN        2
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_GREEN_STR    "2"
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_AMBER        3
#define GPIO_POWER_LED_AMBER_STR    "3"

#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_1             1
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_1_STR         "1"
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_2             9
#define GPIO_LOGO_LED_2_STR         "9"

#define GPIO_WAN_LED                8
#define GPIO_WAN_LED_2              9

#define GPIO_WIFI_2G_LED            13
#define GPIO_WIFI_5G_LED            12
#define GPIO_WIFI_5G_2_LED          16
#define GPIO_WIFI_SUMMARY_LED       14   // from 15 to 14 by ken
 
#define GPIO_LED_SWITCH             19

#define LANG_TBL_MTD_RD             "/dev/mtdblock"
#define LANG_TBL_MTD_WR             "/dev/mtd"

#define ML_MTD_RD                   "/dev/mtdblock"
#define ML_MTD_WR                   "/dev/mtd"
/* MTD definitions */
#define ML1_MTD_RD                  "/dev/mtdblock9"
#define ML1_MTD_WR                  "/dev/mtd9"
#define ML2_MTD_RD                  "/dev/mtdblock10"
#define ML2_MTD_WR                  "/dev/mtd10"
}} __NOTOC__
